query: What is the warranty period for Contoso products?
response: The warranty period for Contoso products typically lasts for one year from the date of purchase, covering manufacturing defects and issues.
ground_truth: The warranty period for Contoso products is one year.

query: How can I reset my Contoso device?
response: To reset your Contoso device, press and hold the power button for ten seconds until the device powers off, then turn it back on.
ground_truth: Press and hold the power button for ten seconds to reset the device.

query: Where can I find the user manual for my Contoso product?
response: You can find the user manual for your Contoso product on our official website under the support section.
ground_truth: The user manual is available on the Contoso website.

query: What should I do if my Contoso device won't turn on?
response: If your Contoso device won't turn on, try charging it for at least 30 minutes, then attempt to power it on again.
ground_truth: Charge the device for 30 minutes if it won't turn on.

query: How do I contact Contoso customer support?
response: You can contact Contoso customer support by calling our toll-free number or by visiting our website and using the live chat feature.
ground_truth: Contact customer support via phone or live chat on the website.

query: What is the return policy for Contoso products?
response: Contoso offers a 30-day return policy for products in their original condition with a receipt.
ground_truth: The return policy is 30 days with a receipt.

query: Can I track my order from Contoso?
response: Yes, you can track your order from Contoso by logging into your account and checking the order status under the 'My Orders' section.
ground_truth: Order tracking is available in the 'My Orders' section.

query: What types of payment does Contoso accept?
response: Contoso accepts various payment methods including credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers.
ground_truth: Payment methods include credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers.

query: How do I update the firmware on my Contoso device?
response: To update the firmware on your Contoso device, connect it to Wi-Fi, go to settings, and select 'Check for Updates.'
ground_truth: Firmware updates can be checked in the settings menu.

query: Is there a mobile app for Contoso products?
response: Yes, Contoso has a mobile app available for both iOS and Android devices that allows you to manage your products.
ground_truth: The Contoso mobile app is available for iOS and Android.

query: What should I do if I receive a defective product?
response: If you receive a defective product, please contact our customer support within 30 days for a replacement or refund.
ground_truth: Contact customer support within 30 days for defective products.

query: How can I find the nearest Contoso store?
response: You can find the nearest Contoso store by using the store locator feature on our website, entering your zip code.
ground_truth: Use the store locator on the website to find a store.

query: What are the features of the latest Contoso tablet?
response: The latest Contoso tablet features a high-resolution display, long battery life, and advanced processing capabilities.
ground_truth: The latest tablet has a high-resolution display and long battery life.

query: How do I set up my new Contoso device?
response: To set up your new Contoso device, follow the on-screen instructions after powering it on, and connect to Wi-Fi when prompted.
ground_truth: Follow on-screen instructions to set up the device.

query: What is the price range for Contoso headphones?
response: Contoso headphones range in price from $49 to $299, depending on the model and features.
ground_truth: Headphone prices range from $49 to $299.

query: Can I extend the warranty on my Contoso product?
response: Yes, you can extend the warranty on your Contoso product by purchasing an extended warranty plan through our website.
ground_truth: Extended warranty plans are available for purchase.

query: What accessories are compatible with my Contoso device?
response: You can find compatible accessories for your Contoso device listed on our website under the accessories section.
ground_truth: Compatible accessories are listed on the Contoso website.

query: How do I clean my Contoso electronics?
response: To clean your Contoso electronics, use a soft, lint-free cloth and avoid using harsh chemicals or abrasive materials.
ground_truth: Use a soft cloth and avoid harsh chemicals for cleaning.

query: What is the battery life of the Contoso smartwatch?
response: The Contoso smartwatch has a battery life of up to 48 hours on a single charge, depending on usage.
ground_truth: The smartwatch battery lasts up to 48 hours.

query: How do I reset my Contoso password?
response: To reset your Contoso password, go to the login page and click on 'Forgot Password?' to receive a reset link via email.
ground_truth: To reset your Contoso password, go to the login page and click on 'Forgot Password?' to receive a reset link via email.
